docs.snippet: The university called the decision by one of the board’s regional directors “unprecedented” and argued that the ruling ignored legal precedent and threatened the structure of college sports....
docs.lead_paragraph: The university called the decision by one of the board’s regional directors “unprecedented” and argued that the ruling ignored legal precedent and threatened the structure of college sports.
docs.abstract: Northwestern University formally requests a review of the ruling that its scholarship football players are employees and thus able to form a union; argues that the ruling ignores legal precedent and threatens the current structure of college sports.
